title: I love Honey
message: I am a little bee and I love to eat honey. I usually stay on Frankie's cheeck because there is a lot of honey there. Yum Yum. I also have a family but I will tell you about that some other time. Frankie is my best friend because he is so much fun to be around.

title: I am a stinky cat
message: My name is Sven and I am a stinky cat. Mostly I like to sit by the window and smell the air to see if I can smell any other cats. If I can then I make a lot of noise because they need to know I am stinky. I like to eat stinky tuna treats and stinky chimkins. Yum Yum. I also like lots of pets and sleeping in the sun.

title: Tiny Guy
message: I am a little baby and I love to eat milk. I can also make noises that sound like a baby elephant. I like to sleep next to daDa because we watch GOT together.

title: Frankie 'Pooh' Splashes
message: I am a free spirit who enjoys poetry, pooh bear and the company of my friend, Woosie, (Woosie is pretend, and he is not real. He is a bee that lives on my cheeck because that is where the honey is). I also enjoy riding my bike, going on walks with family and watching pooh bear with Woosie.
